title: Exploring Rust String Concepts
description: In this lab, we will explore the concept of strings in Rust. Rust has two types of strings: String and &str.

meta.title: Rust Programming | String Handling Essentials
meta.description: Explore the fundamentals of strings in Rust, including the difference between String and &str, string literals, and character encoding conversions.
meta.keywords: Rust, programming, strings, String, &str, literals, encoding
